subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Selecting a field manager and figuring out the status of Hisanori Takahashi are the most immediate concerns for Sandy Alderson, in line to become the Mets’ new general manager.
snippet: Selecting a field manager and figuring out the status of Hisanori Takahashi are the most immediate concerns for Sandy Alderson, in line to become the Mets’ new general manager.
